# lcod://contract/core/value/equals@1.0.0

Compare two JSON values using deep equality.

## Inputs

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `left` | any | No | First value. |
| `right` | any | No | Second value. |

## Outputs

| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `equal` | boolean | True when both values are identical. |
